NO CRUST.
THANK YOU.

VINCE.

I NEED NOS.

- [ Chattering ] - SEE THAT OVER THERE?

DOM, GET IN THE CAR! GO!
TORETTO, STOP RIGHT THERE!
TORETTO!
GET IN!

SO WHAT ABOUT YOU?

I'LL DIE BEFORE I GO BACK.

FOLLOW US.

THEN IT'S NOBODY'S CAR.

translation.en: VINCE, THERE WAS A TIME WHEN I DIDN'T KNOW YOU.
translation.zh: 是啊 多姆 我以前还不认识你呢 文斯

translation.en: THAT WAS IN THE THIRD GRADE!
[ Dominic ] YEAH, SO, WHAT GIRLS ARE HERE?
HO! YOU JUST NAME IT. YOU WANT MINE?
translation.zh: 随便选 要我那个妞儿吗？

translation.en: YOU NEED TO SHUT THE F-- YOU WANT TWO?
YOU DON'T HAVE ANYTHING? YOU LOOK A BIT TIRED.
[ Letty ] YOU SHOULD GO UPSTAIRS AND GIVE ME A MASSAGE.
LOOK AT ALL OUR GUESTS.
translation.zh: 你上楼来给我按摩吧 这么多客人呢

translation.en: HOW ABOUT WE GO UPSTAIRS AND YOU GIVE ME A MASSAGE?
translation.zh: 我们上楼你给我按摩吧？

translation.en: [ Chuckles ] CRAZY LADY.
YOU KNOW YOU OWE ME A TEN-SECOND CAR, RIGHT?
OH, SHIT.
DID YOU WIPE THE SEAT?
OH, JESUS CHRIST! WOULD YOU CUT THIS SHIT ALREADY? COME ON!
COME ON. LET'S GO GET ME A DRINK.
translation.zh: 走吧 给我拿杯酒喝

translation.en: AW, COME ON, MAN. WE WERE JUST ABOUT TO GET ALONG.
translation.zh: 别这样 我们刚要熟络起来呢

translation.en: SO, WHAT DO YOU WANT? UH, ANYTHING, LONG AS IT'S COLD.
YOU KNOW, MY BROTHER LIKES YOU. HE USUALLY DOESN'T LIKE ANYBODY.
YEAH, HE'S A COMPLICATED GUY.
translation.zh: 你很少喜欢什么人 他这人很复杂

translation.en: YEAH? WHAT ABOUT YOU?
I'M SIMPLER. YOU'RE A SHITTY LIAR.
translation.zh: 我就简单多了 你真不会撒谎

translation.en: WELL, I'LL TAKE THAT AS A COMPLIMENT.
BUT THERE'S A PROBLEM. WHAT'S THAT?
YOU NEED TO GET SOME SLEEP.
AND YOU DEFINITELY, DEFINITELY NEED A SHOWER.
COME ON. I'LL TAKE YOU HOME.
SHOW ME YOUR HANDS. VERY GOOD. NOW OPEN THE DOOR.
translation.zh: 手举起来 很好 打开门

translation.en: PUT YOUR HANDS ON YOUR HEAD. BEHIND YOUR HEAD.
FACE THE FRONT OF THE VEHICLE, WALK BACKWARDS TOWARDS THE REAR.
translation.zh: 面朝车前 后退走到车尾

translation.en: TAKE TWO STEPS TO YOUR RIGHT. STOP RIGHT THERE.
WHAT'D I DO?
SHUT UP. HE'S CLEAN, SARGE.
translation.zh: 闭嘴 他没带武器 警长

translation.en: DAMN! MUSE, WILL YOU TAKE THESE THINGS OFF?
translation.zh: 慕斯 把这玩意摘了行吗？

translation.en: SHIT. YOU PUT 'EM ON SO TIGHT. I LIKE REALISM.
YOU LIKE REALISM. YOU NEVER KNOW WHO'S WATCHING, BRIAN.
translation.zh: 谁知道有谁看着呢 布莱恩

translation.en: WOW. NICE CRIB, SERGEANT.
IT'S A LOT NICER THAN THAT LAST PLACE YOU CONFISCATED. AIN'T IT?
translation.zh: 比你上次没收的地方强多了 是吧？这是50年代

translation.en: YOU KNOW, EDDIE FISHER BUILT THIS HOUSE FOR ELIZABETH TAYLOR IN THE '50s.
translation.zh: 是吧？这是50年代 埃迪菲舍给伊丽莎白泰勒建的

translation.en: YOU SEE, EVEN THE COPS ARE HOLLYWOOD IN HOLLYWOOD.
translation.zh: 好莱坞的警察都这么八卦

translation.en: OKAY, HERE HE IS, FRESH FROM TORETTO'S HOT ROD HEAVEN.
translation.zh: 他来了 刚离开托莱多家

translation.en: THAT WAS AN $80,000 VEHICLE, OFFICER.
translation.zh: 他来了 刚离开托莱多家 那辆车八万呢 警官

translation.en: - WAIT A MINUTE. YOU TELL HIM WHAT HAPPENED? - HE KNOWS WHAT HAPPENED.
translation.zh: 那辆车八万呢 警官 -你跟他说了？ -他知道

translation.en: SEND THE BILL TO JOHNNY TRAN. BRIAN.
translation.zh: 你把账单寄给约翰尼谭好了

translation.en: THE KID'S GIVIN' ME ATTITUDE?
translation.zh: 布莱恩 这小子还冲我横上了

translation.en: THAT DOESN'T SPEAK VERY WELL FOR POLICE-F.B.I. RELATIONS, TANNER.
translation.zh: 这可不利警方和联调局的关系 坦纳

translation.en: I WALK IN THE DOOR, AND THE GUY'S ALREADY GIVIN' ME-- ALL RIGHT, ALL RIGHT.
translation.zh: 这算什么？我一走进来… 行了

translation.en: WE'LL TALK, OKAY? LET'S TALK ABOUT IT.
translation.zh: 我们谈谈 好吗？我们来谈谈吧

translation.en: MUSE, WHY DON'T YOU MAKE US FOUR ICED CAPPUCCINOS, PLEASE.
translation.zh: 慕斯 给我们倒四杯冰卡布奇诺

translation.en: COME ON. REGULAR OR DECAF, SARGE?
UH, DECAF, I THINK.
FOUR HIJACKINGS IN TWO MONTHS, AND WE DON'T HAVE ANYTHING.
translation.zh: 两个月内四起抢劫 毫无线索

translation.en: DVD PLAYERS AND DIGITAL CAMERAS ALONE ARE WORTH A MILLION-TWO,
translation.zh: 光是DVD机和数码相机 就价值120万

translation.en: WHICH BRINGS THE GRAND TOTAL TO SIX MILLION PLUS.
WE'RE IN THE POLITICAL CROSSHAIRS NOW, BRIAN.
translation.zh: 我们现在有政治方面的压力 布莱恩

translation.en: THAT'S WHY YOU'RE UNDERCOVER.
YOU WANT THAT DETECTIVE BADGE FAST, KID. AND YOU WANNA KNOW SOMETHING?
translation.zh: 你很想要警探的警徽 知道吗？

translation.en: THE F.B.I. CAN HELP, IF YOU COME THROUGH FOR US.
translation.zh: 联调局可以帮你 如果你帮了我们

translation.en: WHAT DOES THE TRUCK DRIVER SAY?
HE GAVE US THE SAME M.O. THREE HONDA CIVICS, PRECISION DRIVING,
translation.zh: 作案手法都一样 三辆本田思域 驾驶技术精准

translation.en: THE SAME GREEN NEON GLOW FROM UNDER THE CHASSIS.
LAB SAYS THE SKID MARKS CAME BACK THE SAME:
MASHAMOTO Z.X. TIRES.
SO WE KNOW THAT IT'S SOMEBODY IN THE STREET RACING WORLD.
translation.zh: 所以可以确定是街头赛车手

translation.en: WE DON'T MAKE THIS CASE SOON, THE TRUCKERS WILL TAKE MATTERS INTO THEIR OWN HANDS.
translation.zh: 不赶紧破案 卡车司机就要自己解决了

translation.en: I TELL 'EM WE'RE CLOSE.
YOU GONNA MAKE ME A LIAR?
LOOK, WHAT DO WE KNOW?
WE ALL KNOW THIS WORLD REVOLVES AROUND TORETTO, RIGHT?
translation.zh: 我们都知道托莱多 是那个世界的轴心

translation.en: NOW, I'M NOT SAYIN' THAT HE'S NECESSARILY THE ONE THAT'S POPPIN' THESE TRUCKS,
translation.zh: 他未必一定是劫车的人

translation.en: BUT I CAN GUARANTEE THE BOTH OF YOU THAT HE KNOWS WHO IS.
IT'S JUST A MATTER OF TIME UNTIL I WIN--
translation.zh: 我过段时间就能赢得他的… 你要时间可以去买《时代》杂志

translation.en: YOU WANT TIME, BUY THE MAGAZINE. WE DON'T HAVE TIME.
translation.zh: 你要时间可以去买《时代》杂志 我们没时间了

translation.en: JUST GET ME SOMETHING I CAN USE.
IS HARRY COOPERATING?
YEAH, LIKE A GUY THAT'S GONNA DO THREE TO FIVE FOR RECEIVING STOLEN PROPERTY IF HE DOESN'T.
translation.zh: 他不配合就得为收脏蹲三到五年 当然配合了

translation.en: WHAT KIND OF VIBE IS HE GETTING FROM TORETTO?
translation.zh: 当然配合了 他从托莱多那里探到什么口风？

translation.en: HE'S SCARED TO DEATH OF HIM, BUT HE DOESN'T THINK HE'S JACKIN' TRUCKS IN HIS SPARE TIME.
translation.zh: 他很怕他 但并不认为他劫车了

translation.en: - HE'S TOO CONTROLLED FOR THAT. - WAIT.
translation.zh: 他自控力很强 不会那么做 等等

translation.en: NOT THAT I WANT TO CONTRADICT HARRY'S FINE JUDGE OF CHARACTER,
translation.zh: 我不是否定哈利看人的准头

translation.en: BUT, UH, TORETTO DID HARD TIME FOR NEARLY BEATING A GUY TO DEATH.
translation.zh: 我不是否定哈利看人的准头 托莱多曾因几乎将人打死而蹲过牢

translation.en: HE'S GOT NITROUS OXIDE IN HIS BLOOD AND A GAS TANK FOR A BRAIN.
translation.zh: 他血管里流的是氧化亚氮 脑子就是油箱

translation.en: DO NOT TURN YOUR BACK ON HIM.
HEY, TANNER. I'M GONNA NEED ANOTHER CAR.
translation.zh: 坦纳 我需要辆新车

translation.en: WHAT ABOUT PARTS AND SERVICE? HOLD OFF ON THAT.
translation.zh: -零部件和服务呢？ -先等等 多姆 我不知道该怎么办

translation.en: DOM, I DON'T KNOW WHAT TO DO WITH THIS.
translation.zh: 多姆 我不知道该怎么办

translation.en: ALL RIGHT, WHAT THE HELL IS THIS? WHAT DO YOU GOT THERE?
- THIS IS YOUR CAR. - MY CAR?
I SAID A TEN-SECOND CAR, NOT A TEN-MINUTE CAR.
translation.zh: 我说飞车 不是废车

translation.en: YOU COULD PUSH THIS ACROSS THE FINISH LINE, OR TOW IT.
translation.zh: 这车可以推过或拖过终点线

translation.en: COULDN'T EVEN TOW THAT ACROSS THE FINISH LINE.
[ Mia And Letty Laugh ] NO FAITH.
OH, I HAVE FAITH IN YOU, BUT THIS ISN'T A JUNKYARD.
translation.zh: 我相信你 但这不是废车场

translation.en: - THIS IS A GARAGE. - HEY, POP THE HOOD.
- POP THE HOOD? - POP THE HOOD.
[ Jesse ] TWO J.Z. ENGINE.
NO SHIT. AND WHAT DID I TELL YOU?
I RETRACT MY PREVIOUS STATEMENT. YOU KNOW WHAT?
THIS WILL DECIMATE ALL AFTER YOU PUT ABOUT 15 GRAND IN IT.
translation.zh: 投入一万五 这车就是霸主

translation.en: OR MORE, IF WE HAVE TO OVERNIGHT PARTS FROM JAPAN.
translation.zh: 如果从日本连夜进部件 还要花更多

translation.en: WE'LL PUT IT ON MY TAB AT HARRY'S. YES!
I GOTTA GET YOU RACING AGAIN SO I CAN MAKE SOME MONEY OFF YOUR ASS.
translation.zh: 我得让你再去赛车 才好拿你挣点钱

translation.en: THERE'S THIS SHOW DOWN IN THE DESERT CALLED RACE WARS,
translation.zh: 回头会在沙漠里举行一场极速大赛

translation.en: AND THAT'S WHERE YOU'LL DO IT.
I'LL TELL YOU WHAT. WHEN YOU'RE NOT WORKIN' AT HARRY'S, YOU'RE WORKIN' HERE.
translation.zh: 你不在哈利那边工作时 就来这里

translation.en: IF YOU CAN'T FIND THE RIGHT TOOL IN THIS GARAGE, MISTER ARIZONA,
translation.zh: 你如果在这间汽修厂 还找不到合适的工具 亚利桑那州先生

translation.en: YOU DON'T BELONG NEAR A CAR.
HE OWNS YOU NOW.
[ Jesse ] TELL ME WHAT YOU THINK ABOUT THIS. KONI ADJUSTABLES.
translation.zh: 说说你怎么想 科尼可调减振器

translation.en: GONNA SAVE US ABOUT TWO POUNDS.
AND THEY'RE GONNA GIVE US BETTER TRACTION FOR THE HOLE SHOT.
ALL RIGHT?
THIS IS YOUR BASIC LAYOUT OF THE CAR,
translation.zh: 这就是车的基本布置图

translation.en: AND THAT'S PRETTY MUCH WHAT IT COULD LOOK LIKE WHEN IT'S FINISHED.
RED, GREEN.
MAN, YOU SHOULD BE GOIN' TO M.I.T. OR SOMETHIN'. YEAH, RIGHT.
NO, I GOT THAT-- OH, WHAT'S IT CALLED?
THAT ATTENTION DISORDER--
- OH, A.D.D.? - YES, THAT SHIT. YEAH.
YOU KNOW, I WAS GOOD IN ALGEBRA... AND LIKE MATH AND SHIT.
EVERYTHING ELSE I FAILED. DROPPED OUT OF SCHOOL.
translation.zh: 其他都不行 辍学了

translation.en: I DON'T KNOW. IT'S JUST SOMETHIN' ABOUT ENGINES... THAT-THAT CALMS ME DOWN, YOU KNOW?
translation.zh: 说不清 引擎让我感觉镇定

translation.en: I'M OUTTA HERE. COME ON, DOG.
YO, DOM. VINCE, GET OVER HERE AND GIVE US A HAND.
LOOKS LIKE YOU GOT ALL THE HELP YOU NEED, BROTHER.
translation.zh: 你好像有帮手了 哥们

translation.en: - MIA! - ALL RIGHT ALREADY.
translation.zh: 米娅！鸡肉都干了 嗯 我来了

translation.en: THE CHICKEN'S DRY ALREADY. I'M COMIN' OUT ALREADY.
AW. HERE YOU GO.
- ♪ BABY ♪ - HEY, HOLD UP.
BECAUSE YOU WERE THE FIRST OUT OF EVERYBODY HERE... TO REACH IN TO GET THE CHICKEN, YOU SAY GRACE.
translation.zh: 你是第一个拿鸡肉的 你来祈祷

translation.en: DEAR HEAVENLY, UH--
- SPIRIT. - SPIRIT. THANK YOU.
translation.zh: -天上 -神明 神明 谢谢

translation.en: UH, THANK YOU FOR PROVIDING US WITH A DIRECT PORT... NITROUS, UH, INJECTION,
translation.zh: 感谢您给我们氧化亚氮直喷嘴

translation.en: FOUR CORE INTERCOOLERS AND BALL-BEARING TURBOS,
translation.zh: 感谢您给我们氧化亚氮直喷嘴 四核中冷器 滚珠轴承涡轮

translation.en: AND, UM, TITANIUM VALVE SPRINGS.
- THANK YOU. - AMEN.
- NOT BAD. - AMEN.
HE WAS PRAYIN' TO THE CAR GODS, MAN.
[ Dominic ] IF HE'S NOT THE BEST--
- [ Mia ] WHAT DO YOU WANT? - PRACTICE.
THANK YOU, GIRL. LOOK WHO IT IS.
translation.zh: 谢谢 妹子 看这是谁 老朋友

translation.en: OLD COYOTES 'R' US.
[ Leon ] I THOUGHT YOU WEREN'T HUNGRY, PUMPKIN.
YOU KNOW, I GOTTA EAT.
- HE'S ALWAYS HUNGRY. - ALL RIGHT, SIT DOWN.
translation.zh: -总得吃饭啊 -他总是饿的 过来坐吧

translation.en: HOW YOU DOIN', MIA?
HEY, JESSE, HAND ME THAT CHICKEN, BRO. LET'S EAT SOME GRUB, MAN.
WANT SOME OF THAT CHICKEN? WHAT, YOU RENT A MOVIE OR SOMETHIN'?
translation.zh: -杰西 给我鸡肉 -吃点吧 来点鸡肉啊 你租电影了吗？

translation.en: NEED A HAND WITH ANYTHING ELSE?
NO, I'M GOOD. YOU CAN GO JOIN THE BOYS WATCHIN' THE MOVIE.
translation.zh: 不用 去跟男生一起看电影吧

translation.en: WELL, YOU SEE, THE COOK DOESN'T CLEAN WHERE I COME FROM.
translation.zh: 我家那边 厨子不洗碗的

translation.en: I'D LIKE TO GO THERE.
I THINK WE SHOULD GO OUT SOMETIME.
NO, I DON'T DATE MY BROTHER'S FRIENDS.
translation.zh: 我不跟我哥的朋友约会

translation.en: WOW. THAT SUCKS.
I GUESS I'LL HAVE TO KICK HIS ASS THEN. I'D LOVE TO SEE THAT ONE.
translation.zh: 那我得打他了 我倒想见识一下

translation.en: NO, I WOULD-- I WOULD PAY TO SEE THAT ONE, ACTUALLY.
WASH MY CAR WHEN YOU GET DONE.
WHAT WAS THAT? NO, MIA.
translation.zh: 什么？ 米娅 我跟那臭小子说话呢

translation.en: I'M TALKIN' TO THE PUNK.
translation.zh: 米娅 我跟那臭小子说话呢

translation.en: AND WEAR YOUR FAVORITE DRESS, 'CAUSE WHEN YOU'RE DONE,
translation.zh: 穿好你最喜欢的衣服 等你洗完

translation.en: I'M PUTTIN' YOU ON THE STREET WHERE YOU BELONG, CUTIE.
translation.zh: 我要把你送回到大街上去

translation.en: - [ Beeping ] - IS THIS THING BROKEN? WHAT'S WRONG WITH THIS THING? V?
translation.zh: 这东西坏了吗？怎么回事？

translation.en: V, WHAT WAS-- WHAT WAS THAT CUBAN RESTAURANT YOU WANTED TO TAKE ME TO?
translation.zh: 文斯 你想带我去的 那间古巴餐馆叫什么？

translation.en: THE ONE WITH THE PICADILLO AND THE-- LITTLE--
LITTLE RED CANDLES AND THE WOODEN TABLE? YEAH, THE PLANTAIN TOO.
translation.zh: -红蜡烛 木桌子… -芭蕉… 到处放着食物

translation.en: FOOD ALL OVER THE PLACE. WHAT WAS IT CALLED? CHA CHA CHA.
YEAH, THAT'S IT. YEAH.
WELL, YOU CAN TAKE ME THERE.
FRIDAY NIGHT AT 10:00. IS THAT GOOD FOR YOU?
- YEAH, IT'S PERFECT. - GOOD.
THERE'S NO POPCORN? MAKE YOUR OWN GODDAMN POPCORN!
ALL RIGHT. NOW THAT'S VALET PARKING.
HARRY. WHAT'S UP, DOG?
EXCELLENT, BROTHER. COME ON IN, MAN.
CHECK IT. IT'S YOURS. DAMN. WHAT DO WE GOT HERE?
translation.zh: -看看 是你的 -我去 这是谁啊？

translation.en: - HIRED SOME NEW HELP, HUH? - DON'T EVEN THINK ABOUT IT.
WHAT'S UP, HECTOR? WHAT'S UP, BRIAN? HOW YOU FEELIN'?
translation.zh: -真格的 -好啊 好啊 布莱恩 怎么样？

translation.en: SO, WHAT'S UP? WHAT DO YOU NEED? WHAT'S UP, MAN?
I NEED YOU TO HOOK ME UP. THREE OF EVERYTHING. I MADE A LIST.
translation.zh: 给我找点货 每件三样 我列了单子

translation.en: WHY DON'T YOU LOOK THAT OVER.
WHEN DO YOU NEED THIS STUFF BY? TOMORROW, TODAY, NOW.
translation.zh: 什么时候要？ 明天 今天 现在

translation.en: RIGHT. WHITE BOYS WORK FAST, DON'T THEY?
BETO, PASA LA FERIA, HOMES. THAT'S RIGHT.
[ Brian ] HEY, YOU SAID YOU NEED THREE OF ALL THIS STUFF?
translation.zh: （本田思域） -每件三样？ -每件三样

translation.en: [ Hector ] YEAH, THREE OF EVERYTHING. WHAT DO YOU THINK ABOUT THAT?
translation.zh: -每件三样？ -每件三样 怎么样？看啊

translation.en: CHECK THIS OUT.
HE MOANS LIKE A COP.
BRIAN, THIS IS ONE OF THOSE TIMES... WHEN YOU NEED TO BE VERY CLEAR ABOUT WHAT YOU SAY.
translation.zh: 布莱恩 想好你要说什么

translation.en: NOD IF YOU UNDERSTAND ME.
NOD!
SIT UP.
TELL ME WHAT THE HELL YOU'RE DOIN' DOWN HERE.
OH, SHIT. WHAT I'M DOIN'?
[ Panting ] DOM,
I DON'T-- I OWE YOU A TEN-SECOND CAR.
AND WHAT THIS IS ABOUT, THIS IS ABOUT RACE WARS.
I JUST WENT IN THERE, AND HECTOR IS GONNA BE RUNNIN'...
translation.zh: 我刚进去看过 海克特要开的

translation.en: THREE HONDA CIVICS WITH SPOON ENGINES.
translation.zh: 是三辆本田思域 斯布恩引擎

translation.en: AND ON TOP OF THAT, HE JUST CAME INTO HARRY'S...
translation.zh: 而且 他刚去哈利那里

translation.en: AND HE ORDERED THREE T-66 TURBOS,
WITH NOS, AND A MoTeC SYSTEM EXHAUST.
translation.zh: 加上氧化亚氮 和莫泰克排气系统

translation.en: SO, WHAT ARE YOU SAYING?
YOU'RE GONNA GO AROUND AND CHECK EVERYBODY'S SHIT OUT, ONE GARAGE AFTER ANOTHER?
translation.zh: 你要去看看每个人的装备吗？ 一个一个车库的看吗？

translation.en: YEAH.
BECAUSE DOM, YOU KNOW... I CAN'T LOSE AGAIN.
translation.zh: 因为 多姆 我不能再输了

translation.en: [ Vince ] HE'S A COP.
HE'S A COP!
YOU A COP?
LET'S GO FOR A LITTLE RIDE.
WALK!
ALL RIGHT, KID, STAND WATCH.
YO, DOMINIC.
[ Vince ] THERE'S NO ENGINES.
WHAT ARE THEY PLANNIN' ON RACIN' WITH? HOPES AND DREAMS?
translation.zh: 他们打算靠希望和梦想赛车吗？

translation.en: [ Vince ] I DON'T KNOW, BUT I KNOW THEY'RE SNEAKY AS SHIT,
translation.zh: 我不知道 但这不对劲

translation.en: AND THEY'VE GOT ENOUGH MONEY TO BUY ANYTHING.
translation.zh: 他们有的是钱 什么都能买

translation.en: WHAT, JESS?
DOM, WE GOT A WOLF PACK.
[ Jesse ] IT'S JOHNNY TRAN, AND HE'S COMIN' YOUR WAY REALLY FAST!
translation.zh: 是约翰尼谭 他冲你去了 马上到

translation.en: ALL RIGHT, WE GOT COMPANY. SPILNER!
COME ON. MOVE!
LET ME ASK YOU A QUESTION, TED.
DO YOU SEE ANYTHING WRONG HERE?
translation.zh: 你觉得这里有什么不对劲吗？

translation.en: NO.
- WE GOT NO ENGINES, DO WE? - NO!
- DO WE? - NO!
DO WE? NO!
A COUPLE OF NISSAN S.R.-TWENTY MOTORS WILL PULL A PREMIUM...
translation.zh: 尼桑SR20引擎极速大赛前一周

translation.en: ONE WEEK BEFORE RACE WARS, HUH? YEAH, PROBABLY.
YOU'RE A SMART FENCE, TED. MAYBE TOO SMART.
translation.zh: 你是个聪明的黑市贩子 泰德 或许聪明过头了

translation.en: WHAT ARE YOU FEELIN', LANCE?
FORTY WEIGHT?
FIFTY WEIGHT?
A FORTY WEIGHT SOUNDS NICE.
WHERE ARE THEY, TED?
WHERE ARE THEY? ENOUGH!
- WHERE ARE THEY? - THEY'RE IN A WAREHOUSE.
THEY'RE IN A WAREHOUSE, MAN!
TED.
KISS MY SHOES?
[ Johnny ] LET'S GO GET OUR ENGINES.
MY SUPERIORS ARE FLYING IN FROM D.C. DAY AFTER TOMORROW.
translation.zh: 我上级后天从华盛顿飞过来

translation.en: I WANT SOMETHING TO SHOW.
NOW, WE HAVE A TOP ECHELON FENCE WITH A LUBE HOSE IN HIS MOUTH,
translation.zh: 有个黑市贩子被人灌了一嘴机油

translation.en: AUTOMATIC WEAPONS, A JACKET FULL OF PRIORS ON EVERY ONE OF THESE ASIAN PUNKS,
translation.zh: 这群亚裔有连发枪 一堆前科

translation.en: A GARAGE FULL OF DVD PLAYERS AND GENERALLY PSYCHOTIC BEHAVIOR.
translation.zh: 一车库DVD机 和疯狂的行为

translation.en: NOW, TELL ME WHY WE SHOULDN'T MOVE ON JOHNNY TRAN RIGHT NOW...
translation.zh: 一车库DVD机 和疯狂的行为 为什么不马上抓走约翰尼谭

translation.en: AND SEE WHERE WE ARE WHEN THE DUST SETTLES.
BECAUSE ALL WE HAVE IS BEHAVIOR.
translation.zh: 因为现在只有他的疯狂行径

translation.en: JUST LET ME GET SOME HARD EVIDENCE,
translation.zh: 等我拿到切实证据的吧

translation.en: BECAUSE WHAT WE HAVE NOW IS JUST CIRCUMSTANTIAL--
translation.zh: 等我拿到切实证据的吧 我们现在只有…

translation.en: [ Bilkins ] WHAT WE HAVE IS PROBABLE CAUSE.
AND TRUCKERS ARMING THEMSELVES FOR SOME GOOD OLD-FASHIONED VIGILANTE MAYHEM.
translation.zh: 和一群自我武装 准备自我防卫的卡车司机

translation.en: - TELL US ABOUT HECTOR, BRIAN. - OH, LATINOS WITH SPEAR GUNS. GIVE ME A BREAK.
translation.zh: 说说海克特 布莱恩 拿矛枪的拉丁裔 得了

translation.en: NO, HECTOR'S STILL WORKING ON THE ENGINES FOR THE CARS, BUT THE TIRES DON'T MATCH.

COME ON. LET'S MAKE THIS HAPPEN.
- LEON, KEEP ON THOSE SCANNERS. - COPY THAT.
ALL RIGHT, LET'S GO.
YEAH. OKAY, WE TRACED THE NUMBER TO THE NORTHBOUND 86.
MILE 114 OUTSIDE COACHELLA. WE'LL KEEP THE TRACE OPEN, OFFICER.

translation.en: LET ME SEE THIS.

translation.en: ALL RIGHT, I THINK WE'RE ABOUT 40 MILES AWAY.
WHAT ARE YOU GONNA DO?
WHAT ARE YOU GONNA DO?
OKAY! GO TIME!
WE'RE ALL GOOD, MAN. I GOT NOTHING ON THE SCANNERS.

translation.en: KEEP GOING.
VINCE!
VINCE, DON'T! GET BACK IN!
VINCE!
HE'S GOT A DAMN SHOTGUN! LEON!
BACK OFF! BACK OFF! GET HIM OFF OF THERE!
OH, SHIT!
GET ME OFF THIS THING! PULL UP! UN--
PULL UP, I'LL JUMP! UNHOOK-- UNHOOK YOURSELF. DO IT!
DO IT! I CAN'T GET...
YOU CAN DO IT!
COME ON, VINCE!
DOM! I'M PULLING UP TO DISTRACT HIM!

translation.en: COME ON, BOY!
SHOT DOESN'T GET BETTER THAN THIS.
SON OF A BITCH!
TAKE ME OFF HERE OR I'M GONNA UNHOOK THE WIRE!
translation.zh: 我得把金属线松开！ 再试一次 一、二、三！

translation.en: TRY IT AGAIN. ONE, TWO, THREE!
UNHOOK YOURSELF!
I CAN'T GET MY ARM FREE! MY ARM!
- VINCE, GRAB MY HAND! - MY ARM!
LISTEN, GIVE ME YOUR HAND.
I'M GONNA PULL YOU OFF THE RIG!
VINCE!
DOMINIC! HOLD ON!
GIVE ME YOUR HAND! LISTEN TO ME!
DOMINIC! DOMINIC!
DOMINIC!
SHIT!
- DOMINIC! - HANG ON!
DOM! MOVE OUT OF THE WAY. I'M COMING TO GET HIM.
translation.zh: 多姆 让开 我去接他！

translation.en: LETTY!
- LEON! - YO!
PULL BACK FOR LETTY. GET HER OUT OF THERE!
translation.zh: 回去看看莱蒂 把她弄出来！

translation.en: I'M ON IT! GO!
I'VE GOT HER! YOU GET VINCE OFF THAT TRUCK.
translation.zh: 我去接她！ 你把文斯从车上弄下来！

translation.en: LETTY! COME ON, BABY. LETTY?
translation.zh: 莱蒂 亲爱的 莱蒂

translation.en: YOU OKAY? OH, SHIT.
COME ON, GIRL, YOU ALL RIGHT?

translation.en: COME ON, LET ME LOOK AT YOU. COME ON. WE GOT TO GO. LET'S GO.
translation.zh: 来 我看看 走吧 我们走

translation.en: VINCE!
- DOMINIC! - VINCE!
HERE TAKE THE WHEEL.
WHAT DO YOU MEAN? TAKE THE WHEEL! PUT YOUR FOOT ON THE GAS!
translation.zh: -你什么意思？ -你开 踩住油门！

translation.en: I'M GONNA GET HIM. PUT YOUR FOOT ON THE GAS!
translation.zh: 我去接他 踩住油门！

translation.en: OKAY! OKAY!
COME ON. KEEP IT STEADY. I GOT IT!
ALL RIGHT, HOLD ON, VINCE. OKAY!
HEY, HE'S HAVING A HARD TIME HOLDING ON! GET ME A LITTLE CLOSER!
translation.zh: 他快撑不住了 再靠近点

translation.en: ALL RIGHT!
- CLOSER! - I'M MOVING IN!
HOLD IT RIGHT THERE!
GO!
VINCE! YOU GOT TO HANG IN HERE WITH ME RIGHT NOW!
WE'RE GONNA GET YOU OFF THIS THING! GIVE ME YOUR ARM!
translation.zh: 我们把你弄下去 手给我！

translation.en: VINCE, LOOK AT ME! DON'T LET GO!
translation.zh: 文斯 看着我！别放手！

translation.en: COME ON, VINCE! THROW THIS ARM AROUND ME!
VINCE, DON'T LET GO! COME ON!
COME ON, MIA. GET CLOSER!
COME ON! COME ON, VINCE. HERE WE GO!

translation.en: V! OH, SHIT.
IT'S GONNA BE OKAY, LETTY. I LOVE YOU.
translation.zh: 没事的 莱蒂 我爱你

translation.en: WATCH HER. YEAH, I GOT HER.
COME ON, VINCE! HANG IN THERE! COME ON!
IF WE DON'T GET HIM TO AN AMBULANCE IN TEN MINUTES, HE'S DEAD.
HOLD THIS. HOLD THE PRESSURE. I GOT IT.
translation.zh: 否则他要没命的 -按住 -知道了

translation.en: - JUST LIKE THAT. DON'T LET GO. HOLD HIS ARM UP. - VINCE.
translation.zh: 别放手 按住他胳膊

translation.en: YEAH. YEAH, THIS IS OFFICER BRIAN O'CONNER.
I'M OFF-DUTY M.A.P.D.
I NEED A LIFE FLIGHT ROLL OUT RIGHT AWAY.
translation.zh: 马上派一架救生直升机来

translation.en: MY TWENTY IS, UH, HIGHWAY 86, MILE MARKER 147.
I GOT ONE TRAUMA VICTIM, ABOUT 24 YEARS OF AGE.
translation.zh: 一位外伤患者 大概24岁

translation.en: SIX FOOT, MAYBE 200 POUNDS.
translation.zh: 一位外伤患者 大概24岁 1米82 大概90公斤

translation.en: HE'S GOT A REAL DEEP LACERATION TO HIS RIGHT ARM, WITH ARTERIAL BLEEDING.
translation.zh: 右臂重度撕裂伤 动脉出血

translation.en: AND HE'S GOT A-- A SHOTGUN WOUND.
translation.zh: 右臂重度撕裂伤 动脉出血 左侧有近距离猎枪伤

translation.en: CLOSE RANGE TO HIS LEFT FLANK. YEAH.
translation.zh: 左侧有近距离猎枪伤 他要休克了

translation.en: YEAH, AND HE'S GOING INTO SHOCK!
DOM, PUT THE GUN DOWN NOW!
translation.zh: 多姆 马上把枪放下！

translation.en: - MOVE YOUR CAR. - NO. BULLSHIT!
PUT IT DOWN NOW! NO MORE RUNNING!
I'M NOT RUNNING!
- WHERE'S LEON AND LETTY? - THEY'RE LONG GONE!
THEN IT'S OVER. I DIDN'T CALL THE POLICE. BUT DON'T PUSH ME!
translation.zh: 那都结束了 我没报警 别逼我！

translation.en: - PUT THE GUN DOWN! I SWEAR TO GOD! - YOU ARE THE COP!
YOU'RE A COP!
BRIAN! I GOT TO FIND JESSE BEFORE THEY DO.
translation.zh: 布莱恩 我得赶在他们之前 找到杰西

translation.en: I'M ALL THE KID'S GOT. I'LL CALL IN THE PLATES.
translation.zh: 他没别人了 我会上报车牌的

translation.en: P.D. WILL PICK HIM UP WAY BEFORE JOHNNY EVEN GETS NEAR HIM.
translation.zh: 让警察接他走 不会让约翰尼找到他

translation.en: MOVE YOUR CAR. DOM, STOP IT! IT'S OVER.
translation.zh: 车移开 多姆 够了！都结束了！

translation.en: - PLEASE! - MIA, STAY OUT OF IT!
translation.zh: 多姆 够了！都结束了！ 米娅 别掺和！

translation.en: DOMINIC, I AM SO SORRY.
I DON'T KNOW WHAT I'M DOING, DOM.
translation.zh: 我不知道我在干什么 多姆

translation.en: I'M SO SCARED RIGHT NOW. I DON'T KNOW WHAT'S GOING ON.
translation.zh: 我好怕 我不知道怎么回事

translation.en: JESS! WHAT WERE YOU THINKING, MAN?

translation.en: I DON'T KNOW! I PANICKED! I'M SORRY.
translation.zh: 我不知道 我慌了！对不起

translation.en: I'M SCARED! [ Motorcycles Approaching ]
I DON'T KNOW WHAT I'M DOING! WILL YOU PLEASE HELP ME?
translation.zh: 我不知道我在干什么！ 你能帮帮我吗？

translation.en: DOM!
JESSE!
[ Sobbing ] NO, JESSE!
NO, DOM, NO!
CALL 911. YOU. CALL 911!
I USED TO DRAG HERE BACK IN HIGH SCHOOL.
THAT RAILROAD CROSSING UP THERE IS EXACTLY A QUARTER MILE AWAY FROM HERE.
translation.zh: 从这里到火车道正好400米

translation.en: ON GREEN, I'M GOING FOR IT.
THAT'S NOT WHAT I HAD IN MIND.
YOU KNOW WHAT YOU'RE DOING?
I OWE YOU A TEN-SECOND CAR.
[ Dominic ] I LIVE MY LIFE A QUARTER MILE AT A TIME.
NOTHING ELSE MATTERS.
FOR THOSE TEN SECONDS OR LESS...
I'M FREE.
